Reviews.Title: Excellent Kit
Reviews.Author: RuggedShutter
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent kit for the price.  The 55-200mm VR lens is sharp.  The camera bag isn't too bad but I was completely surprised when I opened the package and saw that it had a 32GB Sony memory card.  I was expecting a cheap memory card so I purchased 2x 16GB cards and didn't expect to use the card that came with it.  I won't bother reviewing the camera because there are a ton of other reviews that are more in-depth than anything that I could produce.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D5200
Reviews.Author: happy camper
Reviews.Content: Just learning how to use it.  It seems easy and it very portable, using it for vacations this year...thank you
